amendment.description: To improve the availability to survivors of military decedents of information on the benefits and assistance available through the Federal Government.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1473 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 1473 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Craig. (consideration: CR S12497-12513; text: CR S12501) To improve the availability to survivors of military decedents of information on the benefits and assistance available through the Federal Government.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1473 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1473 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Craig.
